display_long_description:
Watch NBA on TNT games in immersive virtual reality. Be transported to the Inside the NBA studio where you can stream select games and events, including 2020 NBA All-Star and the NBA Playoffs. 
Authenticate with your cable provider to be fully immersed into the NBA on TNT virtual world and access live games and full-game replays.
Features:
- Live VR Cast of the top match-ups
- Choose your camera angle to experience the game from different vantage points
- Exclusive play-by-play and analysis by NBA on TNT personalities 
- Game highlights available for free
- Behind the scenes at 2020 NBA All-Star
- Select games from the 2020 NBA Playoffs
Supported Devices:
- Samsung Gear VR Galaxy 
- Samsung S9
- Samsung S9+
- Samsung S8
- Samsung S8+
- Samsung Note8 
- S7
- S7+ 
- S7 edge 
- Oculus Go
